availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James L. Satterfield (Princeton, Kentucky, farm hand)

body.p: Princeton, Kentucky, farm hand. Kentucky native. Son of John Satterfield and Lucretia Satterfield. Married to Mary M. Gore Satterfield on October 9, 1862. Resident of Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farm hand in Princeton in 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 74; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 34; Jordan Dodd, Kentucky Marriages, 1802-1850, Ancestry, Caldwell County, Kentucky, October 9, 1862; Caldwell County Court, Administration Bonds, 1863-1878, Ancestry, James L. Satterfield administration bond, probated February 4, 1867.
